body.name: Netac 1TB Extreme Portable SSD External Solid State Drives Up to 2000MB/s Read 1700MB/s Write Speed, USB 3.2 Gen.2 Business Travel Essential, ZX20
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 16 hrs 6 mins
features: 【High-Speed 】Netac ZX20 Portable SSD 1TB provide file transfer at speeds up to 2000MB/s and 1700MB/s save time storing and transferring data, which has up to 1TB of storage space for a full library of content in a pocket-sized design.

【Endurance that is second to none】Take a trip without any apprehension.With Netac powerful NVMe solid-state drives, you can save time saving and transferring data. Perfect for students, photographers, business, content creators and gaming.

【A Pocket-sized Design】With its small, light plastic housing, the portable NVMe SSD provide compact, handy storage. It is 71.5 x 43.5 x 8 mm (L x W x T) and weighs only 23g. It’s portable, slim, and sporty.
【Robust Design】Netac ZX20 Portable SSD has shock-resistant aluminium housing with reinforced inner frame makes it more shock resistant and durable.
【What You Get】The pocket-sized drive comes with both a USB Type-C to C cable and a USB Type-C to A cable, welcome guide, 3-year worry-free warranty, and friendly customer service are included.

Why is the transfer speed not matching the labeled speed? 1. Verify the PSSD interface information, which should be USB 3.2 GEN2 (10Gbps). 2. Writing large data for a long time generates a huge amount of heat, the surface temperature exceeds the set value, and it will be downclocked automatically. What if I can't format the drive? 1. Replace the cable and try again, disconnect and connect the drive, and try again. 2. Connect the SSD to a different device port and another computer check if the drive is recognized. 3. Check the BIOS settings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small and fast
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this drive to back up my photos when traveling and it serves that purpose well. Data transfer is nice and fast and the drive is small and light, taking up almost no space in my luggage. I can carry it in my pocket so my photos are always safely with me. This is a great little drive for an attractive price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Speeds are as advertised!
reviews.reviewText: Great little drive for my use case- I have multiple systems and I use this to load game files to each system rather than using up internet bandwidth on each rig (unless you have unlimited, it typically caps to 1.2 TB monthly on residential plans). Games are getting bigger and bigger so this is a simple solution- transfer speeds are as advertised assuming you have the right USB 3 2x2 interface (20gbps).Love the form factor as well- great buy for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars No sirvió ni un sólo mes / It didn't serve a single month.
reviews.reviewText: No sirvió ni un sólo mes. No hay garantía por Amazon y tampoco hay garantía con Netac. Supuestamente Netac tiene garantía pero es falso, no hay garantía con ellos, sólo 1 mes con amazon.It didn't serve a single month. There is no warranty from Amazon and there is no warranty with Netac. Netac supposedly has a warranty but it is false, there is no warranty with them, only 1 month with Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good quality for value
reviews.reviewText: Small and very fast as advertised. Love this little device. Highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Don't expect to get close to the advertised maximum read and write speeds
reviews.reviewText: With 512 GB of storage you have plenty for most peoples backup needs. (There's a 1 TB version available too). While not as small as a regular USB flash drive the case seems more durable plus the larger size will make it less likely that you will lose it. It comes with two data cables, USB-C to USB-C and USB-C to USB-A, so you can connect it to just about any device.The advertised read times are up to 2000 MB/s and write times up to 1700 MB/s. I don't know what test program they used or what test parameters were used but my tests didn't get anywhere near those numbers. I used the MiniTool Partition Wizard v 12.7 on my Windows 10 PC and connected to the USB 3.1 port. Using a 1 GB file length with a transfer size of 4 KB yielded sequential reading at 146 MB/s, sequential writing at 171 MB/s, random reading at 113 MB/s and random writing at 161 MB/s. Using a transfer size of 32 KB yielded sequential reading at 355 MB/s, sequential writing at 382 MB/s, random reading at 350 MB/s and random writing at 370 MB/s. While these don't even approach the rated maximums they are fine for my backup purposes.Overall, I liked the drive but I docked it one star for advertising speeds that I don't believe you can even get close to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for ProRes Video Recording!
reviews.reviewText: Now that iPhones have USB-C, I wanted something to export ProRes video onto off my iPhone. This lil guy does the trick! Very happy with this product and the transfer speeds! Works very well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality and Function
reviews.reviewText: I am completely satisfied with the item. It does just what is described on the Amazon site. The quality and workmanship is excellent. The performance is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Can't Write Fast Enough
reviews.reviewText: I got this as an upgrade to my USB stick that came with my 2023 Tesla Model 3, but my car told me that videos weren't recorded because the SSD wasn't fast enough to write! This product claimed a too good to believe write speed. I should have known better.
